channel.title: [HELP] i have a few questions about my new server
channel.description:
[b][font=Verdana][size=25pt]ok i have a few questions i think its like 5 questions lol[/size][/font][/b]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]QUESTION 1[/font][/size] [size=10pt]ok how do i make my self admin i know put 3 instead of 0 in my user rights thing but it dont work do i need to compile or anything? if there is a detailed tut on this can u please post the like?[/size]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]QUESTION 2[/font][/size] [size=10pt]can i change my stats without actually training in the game? if there is a tut for this can u please post the link?[/size]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]QUESTION 3[/font][/size] [size=10pt]how do i make the starter command? is there a tut for this if so again post a link[/size]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]QUESTION 4[/font][/size] [size=10pt]How can i make it so when people start they have armor and a weapon etc? is there a tut if so again post a link[/size]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]QUESTION 5[/font][/size] [size=10pt]im using testscape source and when i log in it comes up with the message thing about the original server for this source can i change the message to wheat i want it to say post a like if there is a tut if not just tell me how on this thanks[/size]

item.title: [HELP] i have a few questions about my new server
item.dc:creator: @nhonho nhonho
item.description:
@nhonho wrote:

thanks there only the skills i really wanted to know thanks mate

but it didnt work i did it when i was offline and i changed rights to 3 and the skills i wanted to lvl 99 to lvl 99 and put the experience that was need from lvl 1 off the stat but still didnt work and then i opened my file again and the stats was back to 1 and the rights were back to 0 i put the rights back to 3 then saved and then compiled to see what that would do but i dont have a crown next to my name when i talk
can anyone please post some help remember i am running [size=25pt]TESTSCAPE[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2008, 08:44:45 pm[/size][hr]anyone know how to help

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] i have a few questions about my new server

item.title: [HELP] i have a few questions about my new server
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

question 1.

go into your character folder and open your character file. change the rights to 3 and save it if you are logged out of the game. if you are not logged out it will not work.

question 2.

in your character file, you will see character-skill etc.

0 is attack
1 is defence
2 is strength
3 is hp
4 is range
5 is prayer
6 is mage
the rest you have to figure out on your own because i donâ€™t have the time.

the first number after the space is the level, you put the level you want for that skill. the number after that is the xp. to find out the xp of a level just go to runehq and go to calculators and type in the level and it gives the xp for the lvl.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] i have a few questions about my new server
